pages.text: [Blade Oil] is a consumable used to $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_using_blade_oil)enhance the damage$() of your $(l:weapon_category)Witcher swords$() against their respective target. The crafting recipe will yield 2 [Blade Oil].
Ingredients: Gunpowder x1, $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_monster_reagents)Monster Reagent$() x1, Any Flower x1.

pages.title: Monster Reagents
pages.text: Monster Reagents are a vital ingredient used in $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$(). Monster Reagents include: $(li)Rotten Flesh$(li)Spider Eye$(li)Slimeball$(li)Bone

pages.title: Using Blade Oil
pages.text: While holding a $(l:weapon_category)Witcher sword$() in your mainhand, and $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand, striking a foe that is weak to your blade type will consume 1 [Blade Oil] and deal additional damage to the target. A useful tool when hunting a target for a $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract.$()
You must be holding a weapon with a Blade tag and striking the corresponding enemy type!
